verses.name: Acts 23:15
verses.text: Now therefore ye with the council signify to the chief captain that he bring him down unto you to morrow, as though ye would enquire something more perfectly concerning him: and we, or ever he come near, are ready to kill him.

verses.name: Acts 23:16
verses.text: And when Paul’s sister’s son heard of their lying in wait, he went and entered into the castle, and told Paul.

verses.name: Acts 23:17
verses.text: Then Paul called one of the centurions unto him, and said, Bring this young man unto the chief captain: for he hath a certain thing to tell him.
